Orbit Mean-Elements Message (OMM)¶

class ccsds_ndm.Omm(header, segment)¶

Create a new OMM message.

Parameters:

  • header (OdmHeader) – The message header.

  • segment (OmmSegment) – The data segment.

static from_file(path, format)¶

Create an OMM message from a file.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Path to the input file.

  • format (str, optional) – Format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’). Auto-detected if None.

Returns:

The parsed OMM object.

Return type:

Omm

static from_str(data, format)¶
header¶

The message header.

Type:

OdmHeader

segment¶

The data segment.

Type:

OmmSegment

to_file(path, format)¶

Write to file.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Output file path.

  • format (str) – Output format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’).

to_str(format)¶

Serialize to string.

Parameters:

format (str) – Output format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’). (Mandatory)

Returns:

The serialized string.

Return type:

str

class ccsds_ndm.OmmSegment(metadata, data)¶

Create a new OMM Segment.

Parameters:

  • metadata (OmmMetadata) – Segment metadata.

  • data (OmmData) – Segment data.

data¶

Segment data.

Type:

OmmData

metadata¶

Segment metadata.

Type:

OmmMetadata

class ccsds_ndm.OmmMetadata(object_name, object_id, center_name, ref_frame, time_system, mean_element_theory, ref_frame_epoch, comment)¶

Create a new OMM Metadata object.

Parameters:

  • object_name (str) – Spacecraft name.

  • object_id (str) – Object identifier.

  • center_name (str) – Origin of the reference frame.

  • ref_frame (str) – Reference frame.

  • time_system (str) – Time system.

  • mean_element_theory (str) – Description of the Mean Element Theory.

  • ref_frame_epoch (str, optional) – Epoch of the reference frame.

  • comment (list of str, optional) – Comments.

center_name¶

Origin of the reference frame.

Type:

str

comment¶

Comments.

Type:

List[str]

mean_element_theory¶

Description of the Mean Element Theory.

Type:

str

object_id¶

Object identifier.

Type:

str

object_name¶

Spacecraft name.

Type:

str

ref_frame¶

Reference frame.

Type:

str

ref_frame_epoch¶

Epoch of the reference frame.

Type:

Optional[str]

time_system¶

Time system.

Type:

str

class ccsds_ndm.OmmData(mean_elements)¶
covariance_matrix¶

Covariance matrix.

Type:

Optional[OpmCovarianceMatrix]

mean_elements¶

Mean elements.

Type:

MeanElements

spacecraft_parameters¶

Spacecraft parameters.

Type:

Optional[SpacecraftParameters]

tle_parameters¶

TLE parameters.

Type:

Optional[TleParameters]

user_defined_parameters¶

User defined parameters.

Type:

Optional[UserDefined]

class ccsds_ndm.MeanElements(epoch, eccentricity, inclination, ra_of_asc_node, arg_of_pericenter, mean_anomaly, semi_major_axis, mean_motion, gm)¶

Create a new MeanElements object.

Parameters:

  • epoch (str) – Epoch of the mean elements.

  • eccentricity (float) – Eccentricity.

  • inclination (float) – Inclination (deg).

  • ra_of_asc_node (float) – Right ascension of the ascending node (deg).

  • arg_of_pericenter (float) – Argument of pericenter (deg).

  • mean_anomaly (float) – Mean anomaly (deg).

  • semi_major_axis (float, optional) – Semi-major axis (km).

  • mean_motion (float, optional) – Mean motion (rev/day).

  • gm (float, optional) – Gravitational coefficient (km³/s²).

arg_of_pericenter¶

Argument of pericenter.

Units: deg

Type:

float

comments¶

Comments.

Type:

List[str]

eccentricity¶

Eccentricity.

Type:

float

epoch¶

Epoch of the mean elements.

Type:

str

gm¶

Gravitational coefficient (GM).

Units: km³/s²

Type:

Optional[float]

inclination¶

Inclination.

Units: deg

Type:

float

mean_anomaly¶

Mean anomaly.

Units: deg

Type:

float

mean_motion¶

Mean motion.

Units: rev/day

Type:

Optional[float]

ra_of_asc_node¶

Right ascension of the ascending node.

Units: deg

Type:

float

semi_major_axis¶

Semi-major axis.

Units: km

Type:

Optional[float]
